QuestData.Title: The Captured Hunter
QuestData.Description: The quilboar have not only razed our buildings, but have taken tauren captives. I saw them take Honu Staghunter, a young hunter trainer of ours, away in one of their foul cages. Please, find a key on one of the quilboar's bodies and go save her!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Crude Key from one of the Bristleback Quilboar, and use it to unlock the Quilboar Cage holding Honu Staghunter.
